keyword: calories in jack in the box taco
title: Calories in Jack in the Box Taco
meta_description: Learn calories in Jack in the Box taco, including full nutrition facts like fat, carbs, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in Jack in the Box Taco
assumptions: Standard menu item: deep-fried corn tortilla with seasoned beef, cheddar cheese, lettuce, and taco sauce; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, portion size, and customizations. Check Jack in the Box app or menu for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One Jack in the Box taco contains about 150 kcal and 5 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with fast food menus.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Jack in the Box taco?
What are the macros for Jack in the Box taco?
faqs.a: About 13 g carbs, 9 g fat, 5 g protein per taco.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in Jack in the Box tacos?
faqs.a: Yes, around 310 mg sodium per taco due to seasoning and sauce.

faqs.q: How does frying affect calories in Jack in the Box taco?
faqs.a: Deep-frying adds fat and calories compared to baked versions.

faqs.q: Can I customize Jack in the Box taco for fewer calories?
faqs.a: Opt for no sauce or cheese to reduce by 20-50 kcal per taco.
